name: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron
description: This game takes place in a fantasy setting, where a young man called Nelson inherits a cabin from his deceased uncle Sid, not knowing, that the uncle had a magic cauldron during his lifetime. It is point and click adventure with a lot of humor - with many hidden jokes about other games and movies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video Card with at least 512MB VRAM & openGL 2.0 support Storage: 200 MB available space
